value.title: IDC Analysis: IBM Providing AI Solutions to Government
value.excerpt: As technology continues to modernize society, some government agencies are struggling to efficiently connect citizens to the services they need. The COVID-19 pandemic has exacerbated this challenge, resulting in agencies turning to emerging data and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies.
